column5: I think that Pittsburgh will be the victors in the first game tonight.... Whats your choice??? Please keep it civil. Leechman
Well Leechman I still cannot believe Pitsburgh beat Carolina (4 Straight)  So I'm pickin Detroit---so according to my Pro-Line record-bet Pitts  Bush
